Text:
aaaaaaaaah ! my son gonna be happy ! he couldnt play this game cuz of graphical bugs ! 

so hope it will work now !

... :( nope even worse dont start further than where you choose profil... then the config.exe is playing me up and stop working... saying it cannot find the config.ini which is just near by...

nevermind ... my son got hell of others games to play so...

call it a day son, life's a bitch and then we die.
